title: anyone know previous owners of PRX 828B

posts.content:
Hi all,

I have been unable to trace any of the previous owners of the bus I have not long bought.

PRX 828B Green and white - anyone know anything??

thanks

Ade

You can get a list from the DVLA, doesn't cost a lot.

I got one for our bus, wrote to the POs but only one responded.

Although a very nice lady at Exeter Council did call me (they were the first owners?) saying she'd worked there 40 odd years and didn't believe they'd ever had one, might try again next year.

Richard

cheers Richard - do they give you the names & addresses of all the owners - I assume that would just be in th euk as mine is a left hooker, although not sure where it's come from.

there was a letter in with the history from a nice sounding woman to the person she sold the bus to explaining all th ebuses little 'habits' - I did text her & left a message but she didn't reply!

Don't like not knowing much about the history of my bus!

Ade

Yes names and addresses but uk owners only.

Maybe something similar in its country of origin though?
